mapper.insert: insert into img_board (img_bno, img_title, img_content, img_writer) values (#{img_bno},#{img_title},#{img_content},#{img_writer})
mapper.update: update img_board set img_title=#{img_title}, img_content=#{img_content} where img_bno=#{img_bno}
mapper.select: select img_bno, img_title, img_content, img_writer, img_regdate, img_viewcnt from img_board where img_bno>0 order by img_bno desc, img_regdate desc
